html:
Suite of Training and Resources

This is a training and demo course introducing Canvas Uplift, 2024. You are currently in student view. Take a look around the new course, while accessing all your usual documents and training materials.

Learning Objectives for this module:

+  Apply knowledge on business and management principles suitable for further study.

+  Demonstrate understanding of key contemporary business concepts.

+  Gain the ability to analyse the business external environment.

Module Content:
